title: Cornish and Wright letter on Colonization- context

content.question: The authors of the passage make which of the following claims regarding the American Colonization Society?

choices.label: The American Colonization Society wanted to help African Americans buy land in the land of their heritage.
The American Colonization Society wanted to exile the growing free Black population to Africa.
The American Colonization Society promoted a vision of American culture that was inclusive of Black people.
The American Colonization Society hoped to lessen the class distinction between Black and white Americans.

content.answer: The American Colonization Society wanted to exile the growing free Black population to Africa.

topic.text: 2.10: Black Pride, Identity, and the Question of Naming
